steps: This is an electrical component that allows current to flow in one direction only.
There are different types and sizes with each having  its own use
Let us now look at the types.
The LED (Light Emitting Diode) is the most common diode.
They emit light when current flows through them.

variants.steps: The varactor diode is commonly used in electronic tuning.

steps: These photodiode converts light energy into electrical energy
They are used in fire and smoke detectors.
The laser diode is used to emit light energy at very high intensity
The light they emit is called laser
Mostly used in laser printers, barcode readers.
